[vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1598535483936{padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 2.5rem !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1598535504331{padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1598535451325{padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_inner][vc_empty_space height=”2rem”][vc_custom_heading text=”Our Mission” font_container=”tag:h1|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][vc_empty_space height=”1.02rem”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInUp” el_class=”our-mission-para”]

We aim to match the most outstanding students in the biosciences from Pakistan to centers of excellence in academia and industry in the US based on a binational collegial network of scientists. In this way, we strengthen global cooperation in the health sciences and make a unique contribution to the development of future leaders for the Pakistan health-science community.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1598961203525{padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}” el_class=”reverse-row”][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInUp” el_class=”achieve-aim-list” css=”.vc_custom_1599204440153{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

To achieve this aim, we strive to

  • Organize workshops to identify scientific talent
  • Form focus groups in cross-disciplinary areas that underpin modern research to promote collaborations
  • Offer guidelines for application to graduate and internship programs in the U.S
  • Offer online seminars and discussion groups to hone problem-solving skills

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ el_id=”spring-img”][vc_empty_space height=”20″][vc_single_image image=”68″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” css_animation=”fadeInUp” el_class=”img-animation” css=”.vc_custom_1598858675961{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_empty_space][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”1rem”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
